description: ‘Beautyberry’ is an extraordinary plant species that never ceases to amaze with its exotic beauty. It is a low-maintenance plant that, once established, will thrive in almost any conditions. The callicarpa dichotoma 'Shiji Murasaki' WINE SPRITZER has stunning deep purple foliage, and its branches are covered in a multitude of delicate, deep purple, eye-catching berries. This combination makes the beautyberry an engaging addition to any garden. It is most-adored for its vibrant colors in autumn and winter months, making a spectacular statement all year round.
